function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of misinformation through AI-based triage systems leading to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and worsening of symptoms for misdiagnosed patients.","Mitigation":"Implement robust fact-checking and validation processes for the information provided by AI-based triage systems.","Technologies":"Natural Language Processing (NLP) for detecting misinformation, supervised learning algorithms for accuracy validation.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and the general public.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and AI developers."},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks associated with the use of phone-based software for patient data collection.","Impact":"Potential exposure of sensitive patient information, leading to privacy breaches and data misuse.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strong encryption protocols, adherence to data protection regulations, and regular security audits of the software.","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption for data transmission, blockchain for secure data storage, data anonymization techniques.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and software developers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and software developers."},{"Description":"Reliance on blockchain for medication delivery leading to potential supply chain disruptions and errors.","Impact":"Delayed or incorrect medication delivery, leading to patient harm and treatment complications.","Mitigation":"Implementation of backup delivery methods, rigorous supply chain monitoring, and error detection algorithms in the blockchain system.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, blockchain error detection algorithms, real-time tracking systems for medication delivery.","People":"Patients, hospitals, pharmacies, and blockchain companies.","Owner":"Hospitals, pharmacies, and blockchain companies."}]}
